parts.text: I need you to remove local call surcharges from my bill and ensure that I have unlimited talk time going forward.
Can I request you to waive off the extra charges for now
When I spoke to someone yesterday, they said the activation fee would be waived as part of the current promotion and they also offered to remove the remaining balance on my current phone.
we were supposed to get both activation fees waived
I need these huge overage charges waived
Having the late fees waived would be excellent.
Can you not waive the connection fee?
I just want to waive the connection fee for this over charge.
I was wondering if you would be able to check with the loyalty department if they are waiving my activation fee.
Please connect me to someone with the authority to waive the fee.
can you please waive late payment and let me know how much late payment i was charged?
I was just going to pay my first mobility bill and noticed a 65 dollars connection charge. I was told when I signed up that there would be no connection fee.

In my September mobility bill, we had bought new phones and had quite a few issues with mine. Someone told us on the phone that the fee would be waived. So this month the fee is back, can you waive it?
I would like to waive that extra charge also
is it possible to waive that extra connection charge
It was my understanding that roaming charges would be waived while travelling during the pandemic. Just got my bill. I would like those charges waived please.
I saw that telus has agreed to waive roaming charges for those of us that are away.
Can you waive the 23 dollar activation charge?
I have a charge on my bill I want reversed
I specifically asked to do it online because the connection fee was supposed to be waived.
I am asking for the overage charge to be taken off
I thought that they would waive the charge of 89 dollars
I recently found out that you waive the fee for deployed military members so I'm hoping we can look into that.

I spoke with one of your agent last month and cancelled the plan for an additional line on my account as I did not receive the device. The person cancelled the account and said the outstanding amount will be waived off as I did not recieve the service as promised.
Can you waive those late payment fees?
is there anyway that the connection charge can be waived
I have a charge on my mobility bill that I would like removed.  It was for a smart watch that I have returned
An agent told me that if I contacted you the activation fee would be waived
The agent said they were gonna waive those charge
Would you please waive the late fee? We have made a payment through online banking it will appear soon
can this late payment charge be waived?

The previous agent agreed with me there was no point in making a payment arrangment for covid if they were charging late fees so he helped me waive them, im wondering if you can waive the ones that were added yesterday again
There are connection fees charged when I was told these would be waived
I do not feel that a 89% late fee is reasonable. I would like to request a credit for this amount
i was charged with a connection fee that was to be waived - can you please have that waived
I am looking into upgrading early and was wondering if you could waive my remaining 12 months on my device balance

I got a new phone and I was talking to the loyality person when I made the deal.  He said I would not be charged for the connection fee even though I went to a telus store to pick up my phone.  He said it couldn't be taken off until it showed up on my bill.  It is now on my bill and I would like to have it removed.  You should see notes on my file
Can you waive that charge? the previous agent was able to add a retention code.
I don't think the balance was forfeited, especially seing the charges that would ensue
waive my telus activation fee
I bought a new phone with no changes to plan and now there is a connection fee. I would like that removed as I was already connected
i would really appreciate if you waive those charges off for me
I am paying 50 dollars in connection fees? Is it possible to credit me for this.
Can you help me get rid of those charges?
She was getting a lot of spam calls and accidentally called back one of the spam calls for 9 minutes and now I have a 70 dollar phone bill. Can this be waived?
They had just told me that the last 9 months of my current contract could be waived to avoid that charge
I also would like the 123 dollars fees waived for the other devices that were recently set up - I would have set them up online if I had been told this fee would be waived
Im okay with that if I get the 65 dollars transfer fee waived as well
My husband has been using his mobile phone during daytime hours due to covid and has incurred an extra 12 dollars overage fee on our bill. Is there anything we can do?
That connection fee should have been waived
I see I got 123 dollars overage charge on my account, can I have the charge removed please?
There is a connection fee on my bill that I think should be waived. It was waived once, then recharged.
I thought you said you would waive the connection fee
I need you to waive the extra fees as soon as possible
I need to have a roaming charge removed from my bill
there is a reconnect fee on my bill which I was told they would waive the fee as payment had been made
Can you please waive the late fee?
I just looked at my bill and I see a charge for a connection fee that was supposed to be waived.
I am hoping to have that charge waived and would also like to change my plan to have unlimited minutes, if possible
please have my last late fee waived
The agent before said he can waive the late charge for me. But while we were talking about that, we got disconnected.
can you not just waive it now?  That means I have to call in or go through chat or something to have it waived.
Still I got charged.  Can you please waive the charge.
But it has been charged on my bill so I would like it waived as advertised.
So please make the change needed and waive of the additional charges.
I just closed my account and  they were supposed to take the easy roam charge off of it. Could you do that for me please. Thank you
device balance is supposed to be waived
I just want the charge for the 65 dollars removed
I need a credit for the charge of a 123 dollar late fee.
There is a recent long distance charge on my bill for 60 dollars. I was wondering if this could be waived as a one time exception...
I accidently called back a long distance call.  Can I get the 65 dollar charge reversed?
I have been charged 123 dollars in late charges. i would like Telus to credit that amount
i'd kindly like to request a resolution to this matter, if that overage charge could be removed or waived. I would genuinely appreciate it
It was assured reconnection charge would be waived off but never did
I was under the impression that the roaming charges were waived until April 6  I see the credit on my last bill but also have a late payment charge
Last friday April 4th one of the Telus reps added 64 gigabytes of data to my plan and told me the fee would be waived, the 65 dollar fee was on my account this month.
please could you waive roaming charges from my bill.
and will you waive the fee for being early
can you please try to have the reconnect fee waived?

It was my understanding that Telus was waiving the roaming charges but I see they were still on our bills. We were out of country trying to return to Canada. All roaming charges were still added to the bill

i was charged for data on 123-456-7896 however there was supposed to be a data block on. for some reason it was taken off when my phone was upgraded. i did not request that to be removed. i am hoping those data charges can be reversed.
I was told that roam charges will be waived
Secondly is their any chance that the charges for my overage usage could be forgiven? I have recently turned off data to my account, but not before charges occurred
Great.  I have an issue with my current bill.  There is a 64 dollar charge for a call I never made.  I am looking to have the charge reversed.
I want to make sure I don't get charged for local call forwarding on my plan
can i get those charges waived and how to avoid them in the future

I have received my first invoice for our mobility plan which we recently signed and I am a little annoyed that a connection fee was still charged although we have been Telus customers for many years. Can this fee be waived?
i paid you today and i want my late fee waived its a day late there shouldnt be a penalty for that
I see that if you order the phones online the 12 dollar activation fee is waived, could we still have that waived if we need to go into a store for the trade-in
what about renewall charge will that be waived

so is there anything you can do about this activation fee for the inconvenience.. i'm disappointed when i was told there was zero upfront prices then i was told to pay activation fees... i was lied to
can you waive that. doing it online says it's waived. I would think that would be only fair given the situation
Yes, my understanding is that the Easy Roam charges from our travels in March would be waived.

I was told to contact Telus again after we were setup to look into getting the activation fees waived since they couldn't offer the rest after doing the Epp.  So I'm hoping that since we are current ADT customers that we could get a credit for the activation on our two lines that we being offered
So I would appreciate you removing the two charges of 12.12 on Dec 1st and 2nd
It was because I was charged twice for phone activation but they only waived one when both should have been waived. He confirmed that
I would like to see if it is possible to have this charge waived
Checking to see if the activation fee is waived.
May I have the activation fee waived please?
Could that fee be waived?
the agent I spoke with said the entire balance would be waived, is it not?
My friend told me he had the fees waived...Wondering if I can do the same?
We were supposed to get the activations for free. Can you waive those fees?
Could i get a credit for this late fee?
get rid of plan change fee
please waive the conneciton fee
Can you waive the plan change fee by being a loyal customer?
Can we refund the plan change fee since we are loyal customers?
reconnection fee was supposed to be waived why did you include it in the bill?
Can I ask to remove charges for roaming please?
Is it possible to remove this charge?
Can you please take off this overage charge?
I've been charged ten dollars for a call I have never made. I'd like this charge removed.
I never made this call on June the 2nd. Can you please remove this charge
Looking to have charge removed from my bill please
I was in the states and tried to add easy roam but kept getting an error, because of that I incurred a 48 dollar charge. Looking to have it removed from my bill please
Will you waive activation fee if I do it online by myself?
waive connection fee
Need to know if the connection fee on my phone can be waived.
Please waive my connection fee.
Waive my renewal fee.
I want the connection fee waived.
We have been your customers for 10 years and have not before been charged a connection fee when we have upgraded our phones. Will you cancel this charge?
I am looking at my monthly statement. My husband purchased a new phone two weeks ago and we are being charged a connection fee, can you waive this?
We have a monthly plan that includes long distance to US. Why am I charged for my call to the US. Please remove these charges.

You add 50 dollars connection fee. I should get a refund of connection fee 50 dollars. As the guy in telus store told me that telus head office can waive it. So please waive the connection fee. i will be thankful
well I would like a charge removed from my bill
Please answer my question. Will you delete the charge from my account?
Can customer loyalty waive the fee
reverse fee
Hi, I was charged 32 dollars for a call from the US when I have a 100 minutes plan and did not reach the 100 minutes. Can you reimburse me?  I have been a loyal Telus customer for almost 20 years
On April 24 my wife was charged 11 dollars for US Roaming. Please reverse this 11 dollars plus tax

On our recent cell phone bill we were charged 26 dollars for international roaming on my husband's cell but he never left the USA. Can you please advise if those charges can be reversed on next month's bill
I am in Europe and I always have Data Roaming off. These are not accidental usage and I would like a reversal of these charges.
I didn't use data roaming but got charged. Please advise if these roaming charges can be reversed?

For some reason my mum got charged for roaming expenses in the US when she lives at longterm care facility and has never travelled to the US in her life. Can you please correct this on her bill and remove the charge?
i live in whiterock bc i travel to victoria lots and i keep getting charged roaming fees pls take of all roaming fees for the april bill
My invoice for April has a chage for Easy Roam US. I have not travelled to the US. I want the eleven dollar charge reversed
Hello, i was in the states and tried to add the easy roam but kept getting an error, because of that i incurred 48 dollars. Looking to have that removed from my bill please
cancel bill charge
Reverse charges on my bill!
How do I reverse charges that are not done by me?
I'd like to have the 6.42 removed from my bill please
I was told to reach out to customer assistance once my first bill was generated to have the activation fee removed.
I am not using my tablet and would like to remove that charge from my telus mobility bill.  Can I do that on chat or do I have to call in?
This charge should be off my bill.  Can you remove it

My son's phone was supposed to be unlimited talk and text. He has been unable to use the phone and it became a safety issue. he put data on so he could text and I ended up in 150 dollars in extra charges. I'm so angry, I expect the overage charges to be covered, we're long time clients of Telus.
My husband's phone has roaming charges applied in the last day or so and I would like it removed.
My husband's phone has roaming charges applied in the last day or so and I would like it removed. I will try to make sure his roaming data is off while he's there. The charge is on 519-812-6664
Was charged for roaming on March 28 on #604-302-2905â€¦please credit back to account as we never left the country
billed 300 data fee on mobility account have phone with no data capabilities please correct billing to remove the fee now and on future bills
remove fee and discontinue billing it in future
reverse charges
i have a reconnection fee for fifty dollars that i would like to be removed as i have been with you for 20 something years.
While speaking with your rep, I was told the activation fee of fifty would be cancelled.  When she sent me an email outlining my new agreement, she didn't actually waive the fifty dollar fee.

Please confirm there would be no charge on the connection fee with my joining of the internet plan. I checked my bill and found the charge for both mobile numbers. What should I do to remove that payment which was verbally confirmed by your sales?
We have been loyal Telus customers for several years, I have a text stating that we are getting charged roaming costs. I would like to have a solution to get rid of these charges
i need to get a reconnection be taken off of our bill
remove a charge
